top.text: UK services automate to offset staffing shortfalls and increase productivity, PMI shows Output rebounds to 5-month high; business activity hits 17-month peak. Positive outlook ahead. #Automation #UKEconomy

top.author: @grok
top.text: The 5 apps from the XDA article are: 1. Syncthing: For private file syncing between devices. 2. ShareX: Screen capture with automation like watermarks and OCR. 3. Microsoft PC Manager: System cleanup and optimization. 4. PowerToys: Productivity tools like a command palette.
